chbSettingsMenu.name: Set Default Custom Hotbar for All Users

coreSettingsMenu.name: Set Default Core Foundry Hotbar for All Users

chbDisable.name: Disable Custom Hotbar?
chbDisable.nameHint: Check to disable the Custom Hotbar for yourself only. Uncheck to re-enable.

coreDisable.name: Disable Core Hotbar?
coreDisable.nameHint: Check to disable the Core Hotbar for yourself only. Uncheck to re-enable.

keybind.name: Hotbar Keybindings
keybind.nameHint: Use the Module Settings of 'Library: DF Hotkeys' to view and edit your keybindings.

chbPrimaryColor.name: Custom Hotbar Color:
chbPrimaryColor.nameHint: Background color for the extra hotbar added by this module.

chbBorderColor.name: Custom Hotbar Border Color:
chbBorderColor.nameHint: Border color of each macro on the Custom Hotbar.

chbBorderColorActive.name: Custom Hotbar Highlight Color:
chbBorderColorActive.nameHint: Border color of macro when hovered.

chbBorderColorInactive.name: Custom Hotbar Highlight Color (Empty):
chbBorderColorInactive.nameHint: Border color of empty slot when hovered.

chbXPos.name: Custom Hotbar Horizontal Position
chbXPos.nameHint: Higher values are further to the right of the screen horizontally.

chbYPos.name: Custom Hotbar Vertical Position
chbYPos.nameHint: Higher values are further up the screen vertically.

corePrimaryColor.name: Core Foundry Hotbar Color:
corePrimaryColor.nameHint: Background color for the core Foundry hotbar.

coreBorderColor.name: Core Foundry Border Color:
coreBorderColor.nameHint: Border color of each macro on the core Foundry hotbar.

coreBorderColorActive.name: Core Foundry Highlight Color:
coreBorderColorActive.nameHint: Border color of macro when hovered.

coreBorderColorInactive.name: Core Foundry Hotbar Highlight Color (Empty):
coreBorderColorInactive.nameHint: Border color of empty slot when hovered.

coreXPos.name: Core Foundry Hotbar Horizontal Position
coreXPos.nameHint: Higher values are further to the right of the screen horizontally.

coreYPos.name: Core Foundry Hotbar Vertical Position
coreYPos.nameHint: Higher values are further up the screen vertically.
